0100100010010011 0100001000110111 1 -> sum: 1000101011001011, cout: 0
0100111001001101 1110111000110000 0 -> sum: 0011110001111101, cout: 1

1110101111100001 0011010000001101 0 -> sum: 0001111111101110, cout: 1
1101010110101000 0001100010010000 0 -> sum: 1110111000111000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
